bioAsHtml: Working as developer since I was 13 years old, started with dBase, Clipper, C / C++, Perl and than moved to Java. Working as Java developer the last 15 years founded a training and innovation company and now beyond creating softwares I am working with hardware development with Java, Arduino and all-in-one boards.

acceptedTalks.title: Providing Eyes, Ears, and a Mouth to Your IoT Project
Architectures for IoT based on real projects: from Arduino in sailboats to complex Linux smart helmet!

bio: Working as developer since I was 13 years old, started with dBase, Clipper, C / C++, Perl and than moved to Java. Working as Java developer the last 15 years founded a training and innovation company and now beyond creating softwares I am working with hardware development with Java, Arduino and all-in-one boards.
